coach.title: AI Coach
coach.welcome:
Hi! I'm your BioSync AI coach. I can help you with:

- Nutrition advice
- Workout tips
- Sleep optimization
- Goal planning

Ask me anything about your health journey!

age_verification.blocked.body:
Body Mode is designed for users aged 13 and older.

We take child safety seriously and comply with COPPA (Children's Online Privacy Protection Act) regulations.

Please come back when you're older!
age_verification.blocked.title: Age Requirement
age_verification.description:
Body Mode collects health and fitness data to provide personalized recommendations.

To comply with privacy laws, we need to verify your age before you can use the app.

age_verification.errors.future_date: Date of birth cannot be in the future
age_verification.legal_note: By continuing, you agree to our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy. Users under 13 are not permitted to use this app.
age_verification.parental.body:

This app collects health and fitness data to provide personalized recommendations.

age_verification.title: Age Verification
medical_disclaimer.footer_note: By accepting, you confirm that you have read, understood, and agree to this disclaimer. Last updated: January 2026.
medical_disclaimer.scroll_hint: ‚Üì Tap to jump to the end ‚Üì
medical_disclaimer.section.ai_content.bo:
This App uses artificial intelligence (Google Gemini) to generate personalized plans and recommendations. AI-generated content:

‚Ä¢ May contain errors or inaccuracies
‚Ä¢ Is NOT reviewed by medical professionals
‚Ä¢ Should NOT be considered medical advice
‚Ä¢ May not be appropriate for your specific health conditions
‚Ä¢ Is based on general wellness principles, not medical science
medical_disclaimer.section.assumption.bo:
By using this App, you acknowledge and agree that:

‚Ä¢ Physical exercise and dietary changes carry inherent risks
‚Ä¢ You assume full responsibility for your health decisions
‚Ä¢ You will not hold the App developers liable for any injuries
‚Ä¢ Results may vary and are not guaranteed
‚Ä¢ You are responsible for your own health and safety
medical_disclaimer.section.consult.body:
Before starting any diet, exercise program, or making changes to your health routine, you MUST consult with a qualified healthcare provider.

This is especially important if you:
‚Ä¢ Have any medical conditions
‚Ä¢ Take any medications
‚Ä¢ Are pregnant or nursing
‚Ä¢ Have a history of eating disorders
‚Ä¢ Have cardiovascular conditions
‚Ä¢ Have diabetes or blood sugar issues
‚Ä¢ Experience any adverse symptoms
medical_disclaimer.section.consult.title: CONSULT A HEALTHCARE PROVIDER
medical_disclaimer.section.data_accuracy:
Health data synced from wearables, Health Connect, or other sources may be:

‚Ä¢ Delayed or out of sync
‚Ä¢ Affected by device calibration
‚Ä¢ Subject to measurement errors
‚Ä¢ Incomplete or missing

Always verify important health metrics with medical-grade equipment.
medical_disclaimer.section.emergency.bod:
Do NOT rely on this App for emergency medical situations. Signs that require immediate medical attention include:

‚Ä¢ Chest pain or pressure
‚Ä¢ Difficulty breathing
‚Ä¢ Severe dizziness or fainting
‚Ä¢ Sudden severe headache
‚Ä¢ Signs of stroke (face drooping, arm weakness, speech difficulty)
medical_disclaimer.section.emergency.hig: If you experience a medical emergency, call emergency services (911) immediately.
medical_disclaimer.section.health_data.b:
Any health-related data displayed in this App, including but not limited to:

‚Ä¢ Heart rate and heart rate variability
‚Ä¢ Sleep analysis and sleep stages
‚Ä¢ Calorie and nutrition estimates
‚Ä¢ Activity and exercise metrics
‚Ä¢ AI-generated health recommendations

...are ESTIMATES ONLY and may not be accurate. These measurements should NOT be used to make medical decisions.
medical_disclaimer.section.not_device.bo:
This application is NOT a medical device and is NOT regulated by the U.S. Food and Drug Administration (FDA) or any other regulatory body.

The App does NOT:
‚Ä¢ Diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease
‚Ä¢ Provide medical advice or recommendations
‚Ä¢ Replace professional medical consultation
‚Ä¢ Serve as a substitute for professional healthcare
‚Ä¢ Monitor or manage any medical condition
medical_disclaimer.section.notice.body: Body Mode ("the App") is designed for general wellness and fitness tracking purposes only. The information provided by this App is intended to support, not replace, the relationship between a patient and their healthcare provider.
medical_disclaimer.section.notice.title: IMPORTANT NOTICE
medical_disclaimer.subtitle: Please read carefully before using Body Mode
medical_disclaimer.title: Health & Medical Disclaimer
